title: Andrei Sosnitskiy
text:
Andrei Alekseyevich Sosnitskiy ( ; born 8 November 1962 in <a href="Sovetsk%2C%20Kaliningrad%20Oblast">Sovetsk, Kaliningrad Oblast</a>) is a <a href="Belarus">Belarus</a>ian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> coach and a former player.
As a player, he made his professional debut in the <a href="Soviet%20Second%20League">Soviet Second League</a> in 1981 for <a href="FC%20Baltika%20Kaliningrad">FC Baltika Kaliningrad</a>. During his coaching years he worked closely with <a href="Leonid%20Kuchuk">Leonid Kuchuk</a>, serving as his assistant in a number of teams.
Honours.
As coach.
Sheriff Tiraspol
